attributes.action: ensure that MPs are prevented from having more than one job.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: David Blunkett (MP for Sheffield Brightside) has been a vocal advocate for the introduction of ID cards. During this time, he has also been a paid consultant for the preferential bidder to run the ID card scheme. When we can't even trust our elected representatives not to fiddle their expenses, how can we trust that their judgment won't be clouded by external, paid, influences? Public office should be an honour and not a privilege, and it should be the sole focus of the incumbent's attention. Since politicians are feeling contrite, now is the time to get something done. I urge you to sign this petition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
